reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The price point is the main draw at $60 for a mini name brand collection set, the store didn‚Äôt have any of these scents to smell before purchasing which was a gamble. However, these scents can be best compared to gaps 2010s collection. The orange scent was the most appealing but wouldn‚Äôt recommend some paying that price just for the brand name that smells like low grade mall toilette

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This might as well be just water because it doesn‚Äôt do anything. 3 of the 4 scents smell the same, and I poured a half a bottle on myself and could still only smell a candle I had lit in the other room. If you‚Äôre into over paying for microprojection this is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice scents ! 4 mini bottles with different scents. Smells good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous product. While I didn't love all four scents in the set, the ones I did like were classy, sophisticated scents that could be reapplied throughout the day without becoming overwhelming. I was also very pleased with the product value; the mini bottles are so beautiful, would make cute curio pieces once the perfum is finished, and this set is a great way to sample high end perfume without committing to a full bottle before being ready to. This would make a great gift for a perfume lover and Hermes fan!

reviews.review_text: I bought this for my mom for Christmas and she loves them! She really enjoys having nice things so I thought this would be a great option. It is a great way to test different kinds of perfumes. The only reason it‚Äôs not 5 stars is because they‚Äôre a lot smaller than what the product photos made it look like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Might be nice for some, but found these scents reminiscent of very basic scents like laundry detergent or cleaning fluid, or some sort of cheap scented candle. I don‚Äôt find them feminine at all. However they are subtle and not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great set. All of the scents are unique and classy, not overpowering. Nice way to try and see which one works best for you. The bottles are small and aren‚Äôt sprays, but they last a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by the value I felt I got from this set. I didn't love all the scents, but a couple of them really stood out and became my new favorite (as in, if I would buy the full size bottle) - which is exactly the purpose of these smaller sizes. In comparison do other luxury scents, I was very pleased with this
